name: Harvestigator: An IRS Tax Auditing Game
name_original: Harvestigator: An IRS Tax Auditing Game
description:
Harvest season has just ended! While you won't be gathering wheat in this game, you'll surely be raking in dough in this cushy tax auditing desk job.

File through documents, highlight details, and harvest the incomes of farmers in this relaxing IRS auditing game. You'll encounter a diverse range of farmers all across the county. Remember to audit quickly and accurately for better pay! It's commission after all.

Controls:

  • Left click - Interact with objects and drag papers
  • F - Toggle fullscreen
Screenshots:

  • Said (Popper) - Character art and design, playtesting
  • Labib (LaBread) - Music, bug voice, monkey voice, playtesting
  • Lauren - Boss woman voice
  • Ajay - Stick figure voice
  • Faaiz - Strong man voice
  • Emmanuel - Alien voice

Notes: 

Made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 52! The theme was "Harvest".
